# HMCharacteristicMetadataFormatTLV8

**Global Variable**

Indicates that the characteristic has TLV8 values.

## Declaration

```swift
let HMCharacteristicMetadataFormatTLV8: String
```

## Discussion

The value is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSData] object containing a set of one or more TLV8’s, which are packed type-length-value items with an 8-bit type, 8-bit length, and N-byte value.

## Data

- **HMCharacteristicMetadataFormatData**: Indicates that the characteristic has data blob values.
